farmType.title:
Welcome to FarmSmarter.
Let's get to know you so we can give the
best service.
farmType.setupWelcomeText3: Which of these best describes you ?

gender.setupGenderText: Pick the one that suits you...

dob.title: We'd love to celebrate your birthday!!
dob.lessAge: user age must be greater than 14

verifyEmail.title:
That's great, your profile is complete.
Now we just need you to verify your email address by clicking the link in the email we just sent you.
Then you can get started with building your farm.
verifyEmail.title2:
You can view and edit your profile at any time by clicking on the profile icon in the top right of the screen.
If the email hasn't arrived just click the 'resend'

profileImage.title: Please check your emails to verify your email address before continuing - if you can't see our verification message it may be in your spam or junk message folder.
profileImage.title2: Choose a FarmSmarter avatar or upload your own profile image here.
profileImage.selectImage: please select Farmsmarter avatar or upload your own profile image to proceed.

farmName.selectName: please enter farm name to proceed.
farmName.title: To setup your farm we need a few details to be sure we give you the best advice
farmName.title2: Let's start by giving your farm a name.
farmName.name: farm name

farmSetup.title: farm set up
farmSetup.title2: By confirming your land ownership status we can support you in registering your land and accessing finance later on.
farmSetup.selectError: please select farm ownership status to proceed.

farmMap.title: Is this the correct location for your farm? If not, you can hold and drag the map pin to the correct place on the map. We will use this location for farm deliveries and collections later on.

app.notlogged: You are not logged in to an account yet.
app.notloggeds: Please log in or sign up to build your farm profile.

home.farmNotFound: You don't have a farm yet – now you can add your first farm.
home.deleteMsg: This will permanently delete all fields, maps, crops and history associated with your farm.
home.title: This is your personalised farm dashboard where you can access information about, and create new farms.
home.title2: When you click on a farm you will be able to see the fields and crops registered for that farm with lots of other information to help you make the most of your farming life
home.title3: Be aware that If you choose to delete a farm, all the data for that farm will be lost.

farm.deleteMsg: This will permanently delete all maps, crops and information registered for this field in your farm.

fieldName.selectNameError: please enter field name to proceed.
fieldName.farmName: Let's start by giving your farm a name.
fieldName.mapField: now we can map your field

navBar.title: we calculate the crop yield according to the area of your field and an average of you region
navBar.title2: The yield is a dry weight measure, not the weight at harvest time.
navBar.title3: If you have multiple crops in the field then the yield will be proportionately lower than shown.
navBar.walkText: Click on the walk button icon as soon as you are ready to start walking round your field.
navBar.walkText1: You can choose to edit by holding the pins and dragging to the correct position
navBar.drawText: Tap the pencil button to get started. Then tap on the point where you want your boundary line to start and your first yellow map pin will register. The next point you tap on the screen will connect a line from the first pin. Every time you tap it will add another pin in that location around your boundary until you get back to where you started. When you save, the line will join to your first point to complete the shape. To remove a point, click the rewind button and the last pin you placed will be removed. Then you can carry on placing points around your field until you are finished.
navBar.drawText1: You can hold down on a pin and drag it to the correct position if it isn't quite right. When you are happy with the map click save. After saving you can't change the map as we will be making calculations based on this area for your crops.
navBar.drawText2: To remove a point, click this rewind button and the last pin you placed will be removed. Then you can carry on placing pins around your field until you are finished.

fields.question: what was your total yield from this crop?
fields.title: A good estimate is fine, we can help you monitor your field success as we go along.
fields.saveHarvest: when you have save this harvest you can choose a new crop to plant in this field.
fields.tempSuggession: If you have multiple crops in the field then the yield will be proportionately lower.
fields.multiple: if you have multiple crops in the field then
fields.proportional: the yield will be proportionately lowe.
fields.deleteMsg: This will permanently delete all information registered for this crop in your field.
fields.fieldtext1: This is your field home page where you can manage your crops and get the best advice from the FarmSmarter experts.
fields.fieldtext2: We calculate the crop yields according to the area of your field and an average yield for your region. The yield is a dry weight measure, not the weight at harvest time.
fields.fieldtext3: If you have multiple crops in the field then the yield will be proportionately lower than shown.
fields.fieldtext4: For detailed information you can use the crop guides for each crop and when you are ready to harvest your crop, just let us know and we can record your harvest success!
fields.cropfailedde: This crop will be deleted from your field crops

drawFields.placePin: Place the pin on your field. click on the pencil icon after placing the pin on your field. Tab to draw round your field boundary.

walkField.title: FarmSmarter will build your field map as you walk around your field boundary.
walkField.clickBtn: To start, click the walk button.
walkField.content: Are you sure? Once the field is saved we will not be able to change the shape later. You can close this and continue editing if you need to.

cropWelcome.terms: By letting us know what you grew last season in the field. FarmSmarter can give suggestion based on your field location and start to build a crop relationship plan to help your farm to be more productive.
cropWelcome.dont: Don't worry - if the field is new we can still give suggestions, just let us know!

crops.title: The crop suggestions are designed to give your crops and your soil a healthy start. By rotating different crop types we can reduce fertilizer use and naturally improve the soil.
crops.title2: If you want to make a different choice your yields may not improve.
crops.title3: FarmSmarter suggests that you choose one of these crops for the best chance of success.
crops.noCrops: No crop rotation was found for this crop family

oldCrop.title: Please enter your crop in the text box below, we will not be able to give the best rotation advice but will add this to our future crop choices as soon as we can!
oldCrop.name: crop name
oldCrop.selectCrop: select the main crop you grew in this field last season.

plantPlan.title: FarmSmarter supports intercropping up to three crops in one field. But, you can stick with a single crop.
plantPlan.title2: It is important that multiple crops do not compete for nutrients, so we aim to give complementary crop suggestions in your crop rotation wherever possible
plantPlan.question: Will you grow another crop in this field ?

yield.title:
FarmSmarter will track the productivity of your farm from one season to the next.
By giving your last yield for this field we can help you monitor the health of your field over time.
yield.title2: Choose the appropriate measure for your crop and we will calculate the rest for you!
yield.question: what was your total yield from this crop last season ?
yield.fineEstimate: A good estimate is fine, we can help you monitor your field success as we go along.
yield.error: weight and measurement unit is required!

noCrop.title:
Please enter your crop in the text box below, we will not be able to give the best rotation advice but will add this to our future crop
choices as soon as we can!
noCrop.name: crop name
noCrop.cropGrow: select the crop you want to grow.

fieldPlant.name: crop name
fieldPlant.question: Will you grow another crop in this field ?

drawField.title: Click the pencil to start field map. Then drag the blue pin to the starting point of your field border.
drawField.title2:
Tap to generate lines along the field boundary. FarmSmarter will draw a line between the pins for you. Let go and continue in this way until
your field boundary is complete.

profile.title: profile
profile.numberError: phone number must be greater than 8 digits

cong.info: *These items are visible to other users.

farmAddress.setError: farm coordinates or address is required to proceed.
farmAddress.title: Your farm location will be used when you book delivery or collection through FarmSmarter app.
farmAddress.or: or enter your farm delivery address

cropDoc.title: If the diagnosis looks wrong we will make a note and review. In the meantime you can see a full list of disease here:
cropDoc.hello: Hello, I’m the farm smarter crop doctor,
cropDoc.let: let’s have a look a the problem.
cropDoc.offlineinfo: It looks like you're offline right now. As soon as you have internet connection we will connect you with our crop and disease library so you can get the advice you need.

cropClinic.hello: Hello, welcome to the FarmSmarter crop clinic, let’s have a look a the problem.
cropClinic.let: This AI tool currently identifies limited crop diseases including Maize, Sorghum, Cassava & Yam.
cropClinic.photo: Every photo you upload will help it to learn more!.
cropClinic.title: getting the best image for diagnosis
cropClinic.description: Our AI-powered crop clinic works by looking at the images you provide of the crop and its symptoms. The better the image, the more accurate the diagnosis will be. You can choose to capture an image with your camera or upload an existing image from your gallery. When taking your photo, please focus on the part of the crop that shows the most obvious symptoms, for example; an entire leaf or portion of the leaf showing the disease, an entire fruit or seed head showing the symptoms. Avoid photos showing an entire plant or having hands and fingers in the way of the plant or disease. Good light and good focus are very helpful. If the crop clinic gives an inaccurate result please let us know as this information helps us to train it for the future. We are currently diagnosing diseases in Cassava, Yam, Maize and Sorgum. But more crops and diseases will be added soon.

directMsg.title: How does direct message work?
directMsg.description: You can send a direct message to other users. They can choose to accept, ignore or block your message.Please be polite and respectful. FarmSmarter will remove messages that are reported as inappropriate and may block persistent offenders from the messaging tool.

community.title: community chat
community.title2: Before you start chatting in this forum, let's choose the reach of your chat
community.localMsg: 20 mile radius from your registered location
community.howdesc: This is where you can connect with farmers, suppliers, finance providers and other community members to share ideas, get advice and build a strong FarmSmarter Community. You can click on another user's profile image to find out more about them and initiate a private chat. They can choose to accept, ignore or block your message. Please be polite and respectful. FarmSmarter will remove messages that are reported as inappropriate and may block persistent offenders from the messaging tool.
community.blockwarn: this user will be blocked from your direct chat
community.blockreason: please select the reason for your complaint

delete.need: FarmSmarter doesn't do what I need

delete.sorry: We would be sorry to lose you!
delete.info: On account deletion, all your personal and farm information will be deleted.
delete.anyTime: You can come back and register a new account at any time.
